name: Inaugural Address
flavor_text: My first act as emperor was to send the Consul into the wasteland. The golden sun would burn away his corrupt form—a fitting symbol for the revolution that was to be my reign.

frame.name: Adaptive Frame
frame.description: A well-rounded grip, reliable and sturdy.

Barrel optimized for recoil reduction.
  •  Increases stability
